outputs.output_descr: Project aims to produce policy paper on sustainable and inclusive development in the context of EU accession and transition that will reflect outputs of the Conference. As part of the preparatory activities prior to Rio+20 Conference, project will ensure development of background briefs, talking points and other materials in support of the Macedonian Delegation to the Conference. The project committ to do analyses of the Rio+20 outputs and plan of follow-up actions.
